channel.title: Contents on MikeDixson.com
channel.description: Recent content in Contents on MikeDixson.com

item.title: Display content of files with filenames
item.description:
Use the following linux command to display the contents of several files with their filenames prefixed.

tail -n +1 file1.txt file2.txt file3.txt

Displays as

<span class="s1">==> file1.txt <==</span>

File 1 contents

==> file2.txt <==

File 3 contents

==> file3.txt <==

File 3 contents

Computer Vectors by Vecteezy
